00148             function                load_mounted_storages_from_file( $FilePath )
00149             {
00150                   try
00151                   {
00152                         $Data = $this->Cache->get_data( $FilePath );
00153                         if( $Data !== false )
00154                         {
00155                               $this->MountedStorages = $Data;
00156                         }
00157                         else
00158                         {
00159                               $this->MountedStorages = @file_get_contents( $FilePath );
00160                               if( $this->MountedStorages !== false )
00161                               {
00162                                     $this->Cache->add_data( $FilePath , $this->MountedStorages );
00163                               }
00164                         }
00165                         
00166                         $this->MountedStorages = str_replace( "\r" , "\n" , $this->MountedStorages );
00167                         $this->MountedStorages = str_replace( "\n\n" , "\n" , $this->MountedStorages );
00168                         $this->MountedStorages = explode( "\n" , $this->MountedStorages );
00169                   }
00170                   catch( Exception $e )
00171                   {
00172                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00173                   }
00174             }
00175             
00190             function                load_mounted_storages_if_necessary()
00191             {
00192                   try
00193                   {
00196                         if( $this->MountedStorages === false )
00197                         {
00198                               if( file_exists( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/'.$_SERVER[ 'SERVER_NAME' ].'.cf_data_storages' ) )
00199                               {
00200                                     $StoragesConfig = dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/'.$_SERVER[ 'SERVER_NAME' ].'.cf_data_storages';
00201                                     $this->load_mounted_storages_from_file( $StoragesConfig );
00202                               }
00203                               else
00204                               {
00205                                     $this->load_mounted_storages_from_file( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cf_data_storages' );
00206                               }
00207                         }
00208                   }
00209                   catch( Exception $e )
00210                   {
00211                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00212                   }
00213             }

00237             function                process_file_was_not_found_error( $ThrowException )
00238             {
00239                   try
00240                   {
00243                         if( $ThrowException )
00244                         {
00245                               throw( new Exception( "File $FilePath was not found" ) );
00246                         }
00247                         else
00248                         {
00249                               return( false );
00250                         }
00251                   }
00252                   catch( Exception $e )
00253                   {
00254                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00255                   }

00284             function                get_file_path( $FilePath , $ThrowException = true )
00285             {
00286                   try
00287                   {
00288                         $this->load_mounted_storages_if_necessary();
00289                         
00290                         $FilePath = str_replace( '/./' , '/' , $FilePath );
00291                                                 
00294                         $FileName = basename( $FilePath );
00295                         foreach( $this->MountedStorages as $ms )
00296                         {
00297                               if( file_exists( $ms.'/'.$FileName ) )
00298                               {
00299                                     return( $ms.'/'.$FileName );
00300                               }
00301                         }
00302 
00303                         if( file_exists( $FilePath ) )
00304                         {
00305                               return( $FilePath );
00306                         }
00307                         
00308                         return( $this->process_file_was_not_found_error( $ThrowException ) );
00309                   }
00310                   catch( Exception $e )
00311                   {
00312                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00313                   }
00314             }
00315             
00338             function                file_exists( $OriginalFilePath )
00339             {
00340                   try
00341                   {
00342                         $Data = $this->Cache->get_data( $OriginalFilePath );
00343 
00344                         if( $Data === false )
00345                         {
00346                               $FilePath = $this->get_file_path( $OriginalFilePath , false );
00347                               
00348                               return( $this->CachedFS->store_file_exists_info( $OriginalFilePath , $FilePath ) );
00349                         }
00350                         else
00351                         {
00352                               return( $Data == '_file_was_not_found' ? false : true );
00353                         }
00354                   }
00355                   catch( Exception $e )
00356                   {
00357                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00358                   }
00359             }

00387             function                transform_file_contents( $Data , $Mode )
00388             {
00389                   try
00390                   {
00391                         if( $Mode == 'cleaned' )
00392                         {
00393                               $Data = str_replace( "\r" , "\n" , $Data );
00394                               $Data = str_replace( "\n\n" , "\n" , $Data );
00395                               $Data = $this->String->remove_bom( $Data );
00396                         }
00397                         
00398                         if( $Mode == 'exploded' )
00399                         {
00400                               $Data = str_replace( "\r" , "\n" , $Data );
00401                               $Data = str_replace( "\n\n" , "\n" , $Data );
00402                               $Data = explode( "\n" , $Data );
00403                         }
00404                         
00405                         return( $Data );
00406                   }
00407                   catch( Exception $e )
00408                   {
00409                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00410                   }
00411             }

00439             function                file_get_contents( $OriginalFilePath , $Mode = 'none' )
00440             {
00441                   try
00442                   {
00443                         $Data = $this->Cache->get_data( $OriginalFilePath );
00444                         if( $Data === false )
00445                         {
00446                               $Data = @file_get_contents( $this->get_file_path( $OriginalFilePath ) );
00447                               if( $Data === false )
00448                               {
00449                                     $Data = '';
00450                               }
00451                               $this->Cache->add_data( $OriginalFilePath , $Data );
00452                         }
00453 
00454                         $Data = $this->transform_file_contents( $Data , $Mode );
00455                         
00456                         return( $Data );
00457                   }
00458                   catch( Exception $e )
00459                   {
00460                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00461                   }
00462             }

00490             function                compound_file_get_contents( $OriginalFilePath , $Mode = 'none' )
00491             {
00492                   try
00493                   {
00494                         $Data = $this->Cache->get_data( $OriginalFilePath );
00495                         if( $Data === false )
00496                         {
00497                               $FileName = basename( $OriginalFilePath );
00498                               $FileContent = '';
00499                               if( file_exists( $OriginalFilePath ) )
00500                               {
00501                                     $FileContent .= file_get_contents( $OriginalFilePath );
00502                               }
00503                               foreach( $this->MountedStorages as $ms )
00504                               {
00505                                     if( file_exists( $ms.'/'.$FileName ) )
00506                                     {
00507                                           $FileContent .= file_get_contents( $ms.'/'.$FileName );
00508                                     }
00509                               }
00510                               $this->Cache->add_data( $OriginalFilePath , $FileContent );
00511                         }
00512                         $Data = $this->transform_file_contents( $Data , $Mode );
00513                         
00514                         return( $Data );
00515                   }
00516                   catch( Exception $e )
00517                   {
00518                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00519                   }
00520             }

00544             function                file_put_contents( $OriginalFilePath , $Data )
00545             {
00546                   try
00547                   {                       
00548                         if( $this->Cache->data_exists( $OriginalFilePath ) )
00549                         {
00550                               $this->Cache->set_data( $OriginalFilePath , $Data );
00551                         }
00552                         else
00553                         {
00554                               $this->Cache->add_data( $OriginalFilePath , $Data );
00555                         }
00556                         
00557                         $FilePath = $this->get_file_path( $OriginalFilePath , false );
00558                         
00559                         @file_put_contents( $FilePath === false ? $OriginalFilePath : $FilePath , $Data );
00560                   }
00561                   catch( Exception $e )
00562                   {
00563                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00564                   }
00565             }
